item.title: About Hugo
item.description: This theme is created based on hugo-coder. I made it possible to tell yourself more by my change. Please see “FeaturesOfCoderPortfolio” in the post about the change. Regarding other demo contents, it is hugo-coder’s thing. Have questions or suggestions? Feel free to open an issue on GitHub or ask me on Twitter. Hugo is a static site engine written in Go. It makes use of a variety of open source projects including:

item.title: About Meüë®‚Äçüíª
item.description: Hi there, I am Ayush, just another creative geek. This space is dedicated to projects and people I’ve worked with. You will proabably come across all cool projects I’ve worked on by bunking undergrad class and killing weekends building intresting stuff. I love working with javascript and python. I’ve a strong zeal for DevOps too. Bash and python are my bestfriends üë®‚Äçüîß When I’m not coding, tweeting or pushing pixels, you’ll find me cooking, reading books or working out in the park.
